languages.text: {n}Статный мужчина в комиссарском мундире и высокой фуражке приветственно складывает ладони в священную аквилу и торжественно провозглашает:{/n} "Нов{mf|ый|ая} соратни{mf|к|ца} отыскал{mf||а} нас в этих проклятых катакомбах! Не страшись, подойди ближе. Если ты веруешь в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, то мы — твои друзья".

traits.locale_text: {n}Статный мужчина в комиссарском мундире и высокой фуражке приветственно складывает ладони в священную аквилу и торжественно провозглашает:{/n} "Нов{mf|ый|ая} соратни{mf|к|ца} отыскал{mf||а} нас в этих проклятых катакомбах! Не страшись, подойди ближе. Если ты веруешь в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, то мы — твои друзья".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

Не страшись, подойди ближе. Если ты веруешь в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, то мы — твои друзья".

Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}这位相貌庄严的男子身穿政委大衣，头戴高帽。他朝你比了个双头鹰的手势，以庄重的声音宣布道。{/n}“黄金王座又一位忠诚的仆人穿过了这错综复杂的墓地，来到了我们身边！不要怕！快过来吧！只要心怀对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的虔诚，这里的所有人都会是你的盟友。”
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位相貌庄严的男子身穿政委大衣，头戴高帽。他朝你比了个双头鹰的手势，以庄重的声音宣布道。{/n}“黄金王座又一位忠诚的仆人穿过了这错综复杂的墓地，来到了我们身边！不要怕！快过来吧！只要心怀对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的虔诚，这里的所有人都会是你的盟友。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーのコートを着て背の高い官帽をかぶった風格のある男が、アクィラの印を結んで厳粛に告知してきた。{/n}「新たな玉座の忠実な従僕が、この入り組んだ地下墓地への道を発見した！恐れずに来なさい！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を信じる者は、みな我々の仲間です」
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーのコートを着て背の高い官帽をかぶった風格のある男が、アクィラの印を結んで厳粛に告知してきた。{/n}「新たな玉座の忠実な従僕が、この入り組んだ地下墓地への道を発見した！恐れずに来なさい！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を信じる者は、みな我々の仲間です」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El majestuoso hombre con abrigo de Comisario y un alto sombrero de servicio te saluda con el signo del Aquila y una solemne proclamación:{/n} «¡Otr{mf|o|a} leal sirviente del Trono ha encontrado el camino hasta nosotros en estas laberínticas catacumbas! ¡No temas! ¡Acércate! Si tienes fe en el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, aquí solo encontrarás aliados».
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}El majestuoso hombre con abrigo de Comisario y un alto sombrero de servicio te saluda con el signo del Aquila y una solemne proclamación:{/n} «¡Otr{mf|o|a} leal sirviente del Trono ha encontrado el camino hasta nosotros en estas laberínticas catacumbas! ¡No temas! ¡Acércate! Si tienes fe en el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, aquí solo encontrarás aliados».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the Emperor, then you will find only allies here."

languages.text: {n}L'homme imposant, qui porte un uniforme de commissaire et une grande casquette de service, vous salue du signe de l'Aquila tout en disant sur un ton solennel :{/n} « {mf|Un autre loyal serviteur|Une autre loyale servante} du Trône est {mf|venu|venue} à nous dans ces maudites catacombes ! N'ayez crainte ! Approchez ! Si vous avez foi en l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, vous ne trouverez ici que des alliés. »
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme imposant, qui porte un uniforme de commissaire et une grande casquette de service, vous salue du signe de l'Aquila tout en disant sur un ton solennel :{/n} « {mf|Un autre loyal serviteur|Une autre loyale servante} du Trône est {mf|venu|venue} à nous dans ces maudites catacombes ! N'ayez crainte ! Approchez ! Si vous avez foi en l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, vous ne trouverez ici que des alliés. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der stattliche Mann mit Kommissarsmantel und großer Dienstmütze begrüßt dich mit dem Zeichen des Adlers und einer feierlichen Ankündigung:{/n} "Und wieder hat {mf|ein treuer Diener des Throns seinen|eine treue Dienerin des Throns ihren} Weg zu uns in diesen verdammten Katakomben gefunden! Habt keine Angst! Tretet näher! Falls Ihr Vertrauen zum {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} habt, werdet Ihr hier nur Verbündete finden."
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der stattliche Mann mit Kommissarsmantel und großer Dienstmütze begrüßt dich mit dem Zeichen des Adlers und einer feierlichen Ankündigung:{/n} "Und wieder hat {mf|ein treuer Diener des Throns seinen|eine treue Dienerin des Throns ihren} Weg zu uns in diesen verdammten Katakomben gefunden! Habt keine Angst! Tretet näher! Falls Ihr Vertrauen zum {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} habt, werdet Ihr hier nur Verbündete finden."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser paltosu giyip uzun subay kasketi takan gösterişli adam, seni Çift Başlı Kartal işaretiyle selamlıyor ve ciddi bir anonsa başlıyor.{/n} "Taht'ın sadık bir hizmetkârı daha bu kahrolasıca mezarlıkta yolunu buldu! Korkma! Yaklaş! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} inancın varsa burada düşmanlık görmezsin."
languages.original_text: {n}The stately man in a Commissar's coat and a tall service cap greets you with the sign of the Aquila and a solemn announcement:{/n} "Another loyal servant of the Throne has found {mf|his|her} way to us through these confounded catacombs! Fear not! Approach! If you have faith in the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, then you will find only allies here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser paltolu ve uzun subay kasketli gösterişli adam seni Çift Başlı Kartal işaretiyle selamlıyor ve ciddi bir anonsa başlıyor.{/n} "Taht'ın sadık bir hizmetkârı daha bu kahrolasıca mezarlarda yolunu buldu! Korkma! Yaklaş! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a inancın varsa buradan sana düşman çıkmaz."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
